content.raw:
I think the pertinent question is whether we want to be able to support side-by-side installations of multiple minor versions at once.

Since we ensure ABI compatibility between minor releases, there isn’t much incentive for having multiple minor versions installed side-by-side. The user should just install the latest version and forget about the older version. In that case, keeping the doxygen tagfiles for the older minor release wouldn’t have any value if the old minor release isn’t installed anymore.
